description:
UPDATE: We’re happy to confirm that free drink 🍺 will be provided. Please RSVP so we can keep track of numbers…

Join us at Newtown Park Brewing Co in Bristol, this month for an in-person South West Ruby social evening. No talks, but great beer!

Schedule

18:00 - 21:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, and have a chat with fellow attendees. This month we’re having a social!

Slack

If you like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel
title: South West Ruby Social
